page.title: 10FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Five people live in our house. Me Mum, Dad, Gary and Angela. We live on a farm and I help to feed our 4 orphan lambs on milk bottles. Gary had two lambs for his birthday and they are called Jenney and Sally. Mine is callled Mary and Angela's is called Daniel . Our farm is a dairy farm and a mixed farm.We have a lot of cows and calves and a bull, chickens, hens and ducks. Hens lay eggs which we sell. My brother is 12 and I am 9 Angela is 5 Dad is 41 Mum is 36. Mum is a house wife and Dad is a{farmer.} . Gary goes to work at our Grandads farm every Saturday and Sunday.Mum and Dad get up at 6 oclock to start milking the cows.They have to milk 46.In the winter we put the cows in the cubicles and give them silage and they sleep in the cubicles too.
